channel.title: monthiversary on The TechGlider
channel.description: Recent content in monthiversary on The TechGlider

item.title: It's a Monthiversary!!
item.description: Today, it’s been a month I started out posting on this blog. And I feel happy about it. 11 posts in a month; it may seem too less to some of you, but, for me: I suppose I have been keeping up to my goal of writing regularly (and improving by the day :-) ). I know I haven’t been able to fulfill certain promises I made on the blog viz: guide to installing Ubuntu and unveiling the main TechGlider site.
